title: Ep. 1106 - Madonna Is Gay
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEl

After a career distinguished by dating famous men, Madonna “comes out” as a lesbian; Hispanics prefer Christopher Columbus to Biden or Harris, and the president of the largest American teacher union travels overseas for some reason to inspect the war in Ukraine.

- - - 

DailyWire+:

Candace Owens presents “The Greatest Lie Ever Sold”, streaming exclusively on DailyWire+. Watch the trailer here: https://bit.ly/3SsC5se

Shop the Jeremy’s Razors Columbus Day Sale to get 40% OFF your Founder’s Series Shave Kit at jeremysrazors.com. 

 - - -
